[npc2.speech(The boss did say 'e was expectin' visitors,)] [npc2.name] hisses, completely failing to keep [npc2.her] voice low enough to not be overheard, [npc2.speech(An' if these ain't the ones, we can deal with 'em easily enough.)]

The gang members drag you deep into the tunnels, and you (along with your companion) soon find yourself entering milking storage room. If Murk introduced, recognise the room, else describe it and Murk.

If cleared centre, rats are not here. Otherwise, they watch you suspiciously.
You're here to clear the rat warrens of gang members. The guards prepare to fight.
Rats alerted to your presence are waiting here to fight. Defend yourself!
Rats alerted to your presence are waiting here to fight. Defend yourself!
Having defeated the strongest rats in this area, the rest of them have fled, leaving the corridors completely deserted.

Twisting passageways through the rat warrens. In some places very narrow, others wide. Some parts have stone walls, other wood, and in some places, just bare dirt.

Rats sometimes loitering about who give you funny looks or make an occasional comment.

Bunk beds line the walls, and wooden tables and chairs are haphazardly placed in the middle of the room.

If cleared, no rats here. Otherwise: If night, lots of rats sleeping here. In day, just a couple milling about.
You're here to clear the rat warrens of gang members. The rats prepare to fight.

Large room with a bar down one side, and tables in the middle.

If cleared/hostile, nobody here. Otherwise: In day, rats gambling. At night, quieter, but still some around.

Rat behind bar tells you if you want to play, they handle betting money, so let them know. They also sell rum.
You challenge the rats to a fight, saying you're here to clear out the gang. While some run away, 6 stay to fight (including bar-tender).
Having cleared out this area, there's nothing stopping you from looting the bar. You do just that.
The bar-tender tells you the rules of dice poker.
You buy a glass of rum from [npc.name]. [npc.She] says that if you're still thirsty, you can earn your money back by letting [npc.herHim] fuck your throat (or eat her out if no penis).
